summary: Textures changes for Rocks, Mountains, Dirtcliffs, and Tundra moss, High quality low end CPU, and high end CPU.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/49538-3-1388874350.jpg[/img][/center]
[color=#ffcc33]Renthal311 shoot 1920x1080p[/color]
[center][img]http://abload.de/img/tesv.exe_dx9_20140105l9ldm.jpg[/img][/center]
[line]
[center][size=3][color=#ffcc33]Video maked by izon87604[/color][/size][/center]

[center][youtube]AKKIiKOSa1k[/YouTube][/center]
[line]
[center][size=8][color=#ffcc33]Description[/color][/size][/center]
[line]

This texture pack is created for my own personal use, I would now like to share with you. Maked for best performance so should not have a noticeable fps consumption. Enjoy it! ;)

All textures are new from scratch, fully retouched, both textures and normal maps.
[color=#ffcc33]It is entirely my work, you can see it when you use it.[/color]

[line]
[center][size=6][color=#ffcc33]About versions[/color][/size][/center]
[line]

[color=#fe2e2e][b]For Low end CPU. Best Performance[/b][/color]

*.CAD25 Landscape Texture Series Rocks and Mountains
*.CAD25 Landscape Texture Series Dirtcliffs and Tundra Moss 1024v1_1

Main Pack [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49241/?]CAD25 Landscapes Series[/url]
*.CAD25 Landscape Texture Pack exterior 1024v1_1
*.CAD25 Landscape Texture Pack Interior 1024_2048v1_1
*.CAD25 Landscape Texture Pack Roads 2048v1_1

[color=#fe2e2e][b]For High end CPU. Best Quality[/b][/color]

*.CAD25 Landscape Texture Series Rocks and Mountains
*.CAD25 Landscape Texture Series Dirtcliffs and Tundra Moss 2048v2

Main Pack [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49241/?]CAD25 Landscapes Series[/url]
*.CAD25 Landscape Texture Pack Exterior 2048 v2
*.CAD25 Landscape Texture Pack Interior 2048_4096v2
*.CAD25 Landscape Texture Pack Roads 2048v1_1
[line]

[heading]ADD 08/01/2014 Ver1.1 and 2.0[/heading]

New Lichen Textures in Old Gold color, for Tundra, Moss in rocks and Dirtcliffs.

*.New Tundra textures with Lichen 1024p and 2048p
*.New Tundra Moss textures with Lichen 1024 and 2048p
*.New Lichen in Dirtcliffs textures 1024 and 2048p

New Textures color for Rocks and Mountains 2048p

*.Add Normal Gray
*.Add Soft Green
*.Add Soft brown

The textures in soft green and soft brown, were made the basis of maintaining normal gray textures, applying gradient colors for better immersion.

[heading]ADD 04/01/2014 Ver1.1 and 2.0[/heading]

[color=#ffcc33]CAD25 Landscape Texture Series Rocks and Mountains[/color]

*. Rocks and mountains made in 2048p
*. NMM Compatible.

[color=#ffcc33]CAD25 Landscape Texture Series Dirtcliffs and Tundra Moss[/color]

*. Dirtcliffs and Tundra Ver 1_1 1024p for best Performance.
*. Dirtcliffs and Tundra Ver 2.0 2048p for best quality.
*. NMM Compatible.

[line]
[center][size=6][color=#ffcc33]Installation:[/color][/size][/center]
[line]

*. If you are using and i recommend Vivid landscapes series,, install all vivid series first and
overwrite it with my textures for a nice inmersión. Full compatible with paralax.

1. Use NMM o Manual, overwrite.
2. Enjoy it ;).
[line]
If you are using my other Texture pack from the main mod, install first the main mod, and overwrite with this.
[line]
[color=#ffcc33]ADD 08/01/2014[/color]

[line]
[center][size=6][color=#ffcc33]Im using in game and screenshot[/color][/size][/center]
[line]

[center][size=4][color=#ffcc33]Highly commended Mods for better inmersión::[/color][/size][/center]

CAD25 Landscapes Textures Series [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49241/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49241/?][/url]

ENB Realvision by Skyrim Tuner [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?[/url]

SMIM BY Brumbek [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8655/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8655/?[/url]

Skyrim Project Optimization Full by rgabriel15 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32505/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32505/?[/url]

Safe load by Kapaer [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46465/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46465/?[/url]

Climates of tamriel by jjc71 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802/?[/url]

Skyrim Flora Overhaul by Vurt [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/?[/url]

Realistic water two by isoku [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41076/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41076/?[/url]

Realistic lighting Overhaul by Sydney666 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30450/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30450/?[/url]

Vivid Landscapes - All in One by Hein84 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49344/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49344/?[/url]

[line]
[color=#fe2e2e][b]Take your time and send a comment, so I know that I should change or improve. Ideas are welcome.[/b][/color]

Feel free to endorse and add your own screenshot if you want.
This file is a Nexus exclusive, should appreciate my decisión.
If you want use it for you post or some ( Only for Nexus exclusive) Remember link to my mod.

Credits:

To my wife who helped me with the editing of the texture.
izon87604 Tx my friend for collaborate and make a nice video.
